The Messenger of God Tipiya: There are sleeping the deep sleep ancient heroes. Dark force overcame them, and now they lie motionless, forgotten by everyone. They could not resist This Huge Dark Force . And this power has had a major influence... The impact on distant lands... The land where they once lived. Impact on the world of spirits was much stronger, than this world. But precisely because of this, you were able to get to this place. [Quest Q00462_StuffedAncientHeroes 32892-4.htm|Nod]
